attributes.action: Create a Police Force for Airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In favour of Tight Airport security standards, why not create a police force with the Juristiction to protect airports from international terrorism, catching fugitives who try to abscond this country and have full police powers. Not to mention improving a sense of public safety and a positive image of Britains Airports. And call them The British Airport Police BAP like the British Transport Police BTP.
